Articles.Content:
Hello, don't know if anyone else is having Problems with ps4 ver.

Since the update my game is almost unplayable with twice as long load screens and regular game crashes.

Wanted to see if anyone else has these problems.

Welcome to the forums @Peterwilliams! I wish it could have been under better circumstances. 

I've gone ahead and moved your post to the Technical Support (PS4/Xbox One) area of the forum. If there are other people experiencing these issues, this is where they're likely to be.
I'm having load issues as well after launching when revert to build. Takes forever now. I also can no longer recover any craft at any time.

I don't remember where I saw it suggested here on the forums, to make sure you have "checked for updates" for the console, then for the game...

Once that's done and all good, power the console system completely off with the correct shutdown procedure.

Seems to me that somebody said this helped some players.
